actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.

official_title: A bill to clarify enforcement provisions of the Federal Power Act concerning hydroelectric power licensing.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Power Act, with respect to hydroelectric power projects, to subject to a civil penalty any person, State, or municipality that is not in compliance with such Act, or any rule, regulation or order pursuant to it. (Currently, only licensees, permittees, or exemptees are liable for such penalties.)

titles.title: A bill to clarify enforcement provisions of the Federal Power Act concerning hydroelectric power licensing.
